content.text: Zendaya, whose last name is Coleman, was born in Oakland, California. She grew up there and in Los Angeles, California.

content.sourceTitle: Where does Zendaya Coleman go to church.
content.text: All we have to go on with Zendaya's religion is speculation. Neither her MySpace page nor Facebook page list a religion so I think it's safe to assume she isn't very religious. Fans speculate that she is Christian,
but again, no proof of that.

content.sourceTitle: 2012 White House Easter Egg Roll: Zendaya Performs.
content.text: As far as politics goes, not a lot on that either. She performed at the White House Easter Egg Roll in 2012,

content.sourceTitle: Happy Anniversary To Zendaya Coleman's Parents June 20, 2012.
content.text: but that in itself is obviously not a show of support for President Obama. Zendaya has a white mother and a black father,
however, so no matter what she thinks about his politics, she at least has something in common with the President.

content.sourceTitle: 'Shake It Up' star Zendaya Coleman gives back to peta2!
content.text: Zendaya is a vegetarian, and is a PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) supporter. She partnered with the company Millions of Milkshakes to donate $1 of every one of her signature milkshakes sold to the animal rights organization.
Because of her eating habits and support of PETA, I think we can call her liberal. And if she keeps on in Hollywood, chances are she'll stay liberal.
